org.apache.hadoop.fs

接口 Syncable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CryptoFSDataOutputStream, FSDataOutputStream, SequenceFile.Writer

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface Syncable
    This interface for flush/sync operation.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void hflush()
      Flush out the data in client's user buffer.
      void hsync()
      Similar to posix fsync, flush out the data in client's user buffer all the way to the disk device (but the disk may have it in its cache).
      void sync()
      已过时。 
      As of HADOOP 0.21.0, replaced by hflush

    • 方法详细资料

      • sync

        @Deprecated
void sync()
          throws IOException
        已过时。 As of HADOOP 0.21.0, replaced by hflush
        抛出:
        IOException
        另请参阅:
        hflush()

      • hflush

        void hflush()
            throws IOException
        Flush out the data in client's user buffer. After the return of this call, new readers will see the data.
        抛出:
        IOException - if any error occurs

      • hsync

        void hsync()
           throws IOException
        Similar to posix fsync, flush out the data in client's user buffer all the way to the disk device (but the disk may have it in its cache).
        抛出:
        IOException - if error occurs
